type ViewProps<T extends React.ElementType> = {
  as?: T;
} & React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<T>;

export const View = <T extends React.ElementType = "div">({
  as,
  ...props
}: ViewProps<T>) => {
  const Element = as || "div";
  return <Element {...props} />;
};
